body: Starts off as rape; swaps to vanilla under 3 chapters. Wtf, but ok.

I believe it was an actual old existing job that took place in Japan, but doesn't exist anymore, for... obvious reasons. So the manga takes advantage of this for its plot I guess. Also, it IS kind of rapey, but at the same time it's not, due to both girls ending up liking the guy. He doesn't fuck any other girl aside from these 2.

This is such a fucked up doujinshi and I'm surprised no one else mentions the problems with it. What kind of a job lets a guy wash the bodies of females? Also, the MC is a molester and rapist. He molests and rapes these girls and they're OK with it. The orange haired girl seems to like the MC, but it's still molesting and rape. Also, the magic of hentai; the guy cums inside raw every time but the girls don't get pregnant unless the author says so. Unrealistic.

Art is good, the girls are cute as hell and the sex scenes are drawn well. Unfortunately, the story and characters are trash. Utter trash.
Can't wait for the next one
I Hate Tsundere like Chitoge in Nisekoi Shit..
You were fucked but still a tsundere
wow, some of scenes changed in the anime adaptation
